TopicTitle: Can we get our YouTube sub forum back?

Articles.Content: Title says it all.. I'd like a place to post my videos, and a single thread to keep adding them to

and also the Mission Reports section.

and make posts count there .___.

I think the mission reports section was good, but I didn't like the youtubes section. Hardly anyone seemed to go in there and many good videos went unseen by the majority of people. Things posted in GD always get some response, but I'd posted a couple vids in there and they got little reaction as had many other really good vids. Most things had 0 replies and there was plenty that would have got replies had they been put in GD.

I think mostly only video makers and a few fans went there, new users never went there.

I think the mission reports section was good, but I didn't like the youtubes section. Hardly anyone seemed to go in there and many good videos went unseen by the majority of people. Things posted in GD always get some response, but I'd posted a couple vids in there and they got little reaction as had many other really good vids.

May I suggest a satellite thread in GD to say "hey here's a cool videos I made. The rest of them are here." with "here" being a link to your thread in the youtube section?
